ExtKnowledgeConnector.name: ExtKnowledgeConnector
ExtKnowledgeConnector.description: Represents a connector to a third-party knowledge source for Unified Knowledge.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the automated action condition record is locked or not.

LastSyncDate.description: Indicates when the connector last synced with the third-party knowledge source to import articles into Salesforce.

LastSyncStatus.description: Indicates the status of the connector’s last sync of articles from the third-party knowledge source into Salesforce.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the automated import article condition record can be edited or not.

Name.description: The connector’s label in Unified Knowledge setup.

NamedCredentialId.description: Salesforce ID of the named credential that’s used for a request. The named credential identifies the third-party system and the third-party authentication settings.

OwnerId.description: The user ID of the owner of the connector.

ShouldOpenInSource.description: Indicates whether articles imported into Salesforce open in the third-party source from links in Salesforce.
